ygData.subject: Re: Funny zoning stories
ygData.msgSnippet: I too had a strange event happen one very laggy night.  Zoned out of Permafrost naked.  Zoned back in to see if I would get my stuff (thought what the heck
ygData.messageBody:
I too had a strange event happen one very laggy night. Zoned out of
Permafrost naked. Zoned back in to see if I would get my stuff (thought
what the heck let's try). Entering into Permafrost dungeon i was greeted
with the view of the area around Halas with people falling from the sky. In
a cliff was my corpse which i could not loot. Now for the really surreal
thing. Not everybody was seeing the same things. Most were seeing
Permafrost as the icy cave it is and someone dragged my corpse to the zone
border. I camped and relogged. Logging back in I was fully clothed. I
lost a weapon though. I did a petition and bug report but got no reply.

Fflewdeur Fflamson
Cazic-Thule

P.S. first post in about 3 months!



>
> >Funny anecdote. A friend of mine was running from a train and
> >managed to zone. You know how mobs can still hit you for a
> >while after you've zoned and you come out with fewer hp than
> >when you hit the zone? Well, apparently one of the mobs
> >rooted my friend during this interval. He came out safe on
> >the other side, but rooted.
>
>
>I was once rooted JUST BEFORE I zoned, but the force of the mob hitting me
>knocked me through the zone. I came out alive, and still rooted. :)
>
>Also, once I was running from a tentacle terror in Najena, and I was almost
>dead and down to a walk (with a ranger, no speed song *cry*). I was surely
>going to die. But the tentacle terror hit me with one of his spells that
>throws you to the other side of the room, and since he was behind me, he
>blasted me through the zone and gave me a one-way superspeedy ticket to
>safety.
>
>Daleia
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
>with the subject lol.
><< text3.html >>
